page.title: 11Drinks Survey-Spennymoor.
page.content: We asked many people in Spennymoor what their favourite drink was and obtained the following results. The most popular drink was{tea}and 33% of the people surveyed said it was their favourite. The next most popular drink was{coffee}and 16% of the people surveyed said they prefered it.{Beer} came next with 10% of the people choosing it. The next most popular drink was{lemonade}and 9% of the people intervieved chose it. Next was lager with 5% of the people choosing it.{Wines}also had 5%. The next favourite was{milk}and 4% of the people said it was their favourite. Next came{fruit juice}with 2%, liqueurs and{hot chocolate}were also chosen by a few people.
